channel.title: New Section (yes, another one)
channel.description:
CHAT BOX!!!
Why: It will allow people with small questions to get them answered a lot faster. It will benefit the site's community, as it will let people lead smaller conversations a lot faster. Threads will become a matter of mass discussion, rather that making a whole thread just to ask why Jagex takes for ever to run an apeal.
Adding a Chat Box is a WIN<---->WIN situation for the site.
Coments encouraged, but who I realy want to hear from is Mopar.

item.title: New Section (yes, another one)
item.dc:creator: @Akriam Akriam
item.description:
@Akriam wrote:

Yes, from personal experiance, c-boxes are not good. I have a sight with 30 or so members and it was filled with swears and spam. Think of 40k members…ouch! You couln’t even read a message. Normally 200 people on? Maybe 50 are using CBox, thats 50 messages per minute (possibly :)) you would have a little more than a second to read the message!

Read full topic

item.title: New Section (yes, another one)
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I think we all know a chatboc would be FILLED with moparscape questions. And either way it looks messy and stuff.

Read full topic
